title: The Ultimate Party Sandwich
ingredients: ['1 (500g) loaf ciabatta, bloomer or baguette, halved lengthways', '60g butter, softened', '1 clove garlic, minced', '80g grated Parmesan cheese', '1 cos lettuce, shredded', '450g sliced cooked ham', '450g sliced turkey breast', '450g sliced salami', '450g sliced mozzarella cheese', '450g sliced Edam or Gruyere cheese', '450g sliced mild Cheddar cheese', '2 tomatoes, sliced', '1 large onion, sliced', '1 (350g) tin pitted black olives, sliced', '1/2 (290g) jar mushrooms, drained and sliced', '1 green pepper, seeded and thinly sliced']
